phpunit.driverPriority.description: Set the priority of drivers to try and run phpunit with. The drivers will try and find phpunit in common places.

phpunit.php.description: Absolute path to php. Fallback to global php if it exists on the command line.

phpunit.phpunit.description:
Path to phpunit. Can be the phpunit file or phpunit.phar.

Automatically finds it in common places:
  - Composer vendor directory
  - phpunit.phar in your project
  - phpunit (or phpunit.bat for windows) globally on the command line

phpunit.ssh.description:
DEPRECATED: Please use the [Remote Development Extension by Microsoft](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode-remote.vscode-remote-extensionpack) for a great remote development experience.

Custom ssh command to run Ex: `ssh root@localhost`.
REQUIRED: Public/private keys are required to use ssh, passwords won't work.

The command will resolve to `ssh root@localhost "<command>"` where `<command>` is populated like normal by the extension and could be something like `php ./phpunit.phar -c phpunit.xml` depending on your settings.

You may also want to use the `phpunit.paths` setting to map local paths to remote ones.

How to setup ssh public/private keys:
  - Windows powershell `ssh-keygen && cat $env:userprofile/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | ssh root@localhost 'cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys'`
  - Linux bash `ssh-keygen && ssh-copy-id root@localhost`

phpunit.command.description: Custom command to run. Ex: `docker exec -t container_name`.

phpunit.preferRunClassTestOverQuickPickW.description: If we should test the whole class instead of showing the quick pick window when cursor is on anything but a function name.

phpunit.clearOutputOnRun.description: True will clear the output when we run a new test. False will leave the output after every test.

phpunit.colors.description: Will add argument `--colors=always` to the `phpunit` command or whatever is set here. `null` or empty string removes this setting.
